website_summaries.verdict: This hot air brush uses tourmaline ceramic technology to straighten hair.
pros: The Triple Action Styling System works to detangle, straighten and control frizz
Works on thick and naturally curly hair without snagging or pulling hair
cons: Some quality control issues with the product breaking after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Tool I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have fine-textured hair with a slight wave to it, and I have gone through countless blow-dryers, blow-brushes, etc. in the quest to direct my hair, not curl it. This is the first time I have found something that does the job without pulling or snagging my hair. I'm considering buying another one for backup as I have found nothing remotely similar on the market. I really like the fact that it allows so much control and dries well without adding curl. Really terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McBrair

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is easy to use and I like how it is able to straighten my hair with one pass through (after air drying my hair first) and my hair is soft and shiny. It is able to blow dry and straighten but if you do not want to use alot of heat on your hair I would suggest letting your hair air dry first then using the item.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing for the uncoordinated girls out there
customer_reviews.text: I have natural 4c hair with a very tight curl. This helps me blow it out before I straighten. This has helped me get my hair looking straight, shiny, and bouncy with minimal product and effort. I had one of these back in 2007 and I got rid of it and have regretted it ever since. I only wish it was easier to clean and slightly less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyRose_03

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking all around the globe for this item. I originally purchased this years ago (2008), and had to discard it when some hair got caught in the bottom vent piece. The smell of burning hair resonated every time I tried to use it, so in the trash it went. The modified version gives you the option of opening this area and removing any hair that may get caught. Also, it has a hard foam piece behind the vent that gives more protection. Great model improvement guys!
customer_reviews.author: Kazara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOVE this blow dryer. I am an African American female with natural hair. This is the only thing I use to blow dry my hair. I used to flat iron my hair as well as blow dry it to make it more manageable but now all I have to do is blow dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast Drying and Styling
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hair dryer for as long as they have been making it. When it gets too grungy to clean, I order another one. It will poof out my hair or dry it straight. Best of all, it doesn't require the two-hand coordination that a normal hair dryer and a round brush demand. I'm not good at that blow-dryer/brush thing, and my arms get tired. With the Infiniti Pro, it's easy to dry and style my hair. The cool setting works great too. I hope they never stop making it. The only thing that keeps it from 5 stars is that it's not so easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pugdame

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: This has less air power then a cheap blow dryer and doesn't do any form of curling , to top it off its not returnable so do your research and buy a better styler.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great on course African American hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of two young girls. Between us we have different texture hair. This dryer works to dry and straighten all our hair types. I wish I had had this years ago! This cuts our hair drying and straightening in half. We all have natural hair.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This does not work on my hair (thick, fine hair with a slight wave). It pretty much just pushed my hair around but didn't not add any shine or defrizz. Tried with both damp and completely dry hair. Was able to return but really disappointed it didn't work and I get to walk around with a frizzy head.
customer_reviews.author: JLSinSEA

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated & Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Really upset that I've only had this blow dryer a month and a half & it's already burning out when I've only used it 3 times since I have purchased this. This is annoying because the 30 days for a refund or an exchange has passed, so in order to get a new one,​ I have to purchase it again. Who is to say this won't happen again if I purchase a new one. Really frustrated because I love this blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Great on 4c hair!
customer_reviews.text: As a black woman with unprocessed natural hair blow drying my hair is always dreaded. I feel like this product was made for me! I’ve used the Revlon One Step Hair Dryer & Styler but found that it’s much too tedious and is not effective is really taming my curls and coils. With this InfinitiPro, I don’t need to add much product to my hair to help straighten it. After blowing, I followed up with a flat iron and my hair has plenty of volume and bounce! I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this blow dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Lish J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Thinning Hair
customer_reviews.text: As a straightener this item is only 4/5 because it takes a few passes to straighten my wavy/curly hair. I love the gentleness of it though. My hair sheds a lot with most tools. Other than my Dyson airwrap which doesnt let my hair shed at all, this is the next best thing with minimal shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it...but dead after 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I have fine, wavy hair and this is a fast, easy way to straighten it. However, after 4 months of use about once a week, it died! I can not recommend a product with such a short life span. I expected it to last a few years at least. Very disappointed and I will not buy another one of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: HollyCST

customer_reviews.title: So dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these wet/dry stylers in the past. They usually last about 2 years, then the motor starts to give out and finally dies. I ordered this replacement, and the motor burned out on its second use. I was in the 30 day window, but I’ll miss this brand. I hope Conair gets their quality back, I’d buy another one, until then, I’ll look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: klw

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter. She used it as a styling tool when her hair was already dry. Basically, just too smooth her blow dried hair when it would get a little frizzy. Seemed to work fine for that use, but that's all she used it for and it just broke after only 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it sounded
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about, sounded it would be a good solution for my non skilled hands to straighten my hair but ended up not... I have wavy hair, not thin nor thick, overall healthy. But this makes it look frizzy and spongy, and I didn't find it practical. You have to blow dry ir first, then use this brush, it adds volume but it left a weird frizz effect on mu ends. Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Black girl hair approved! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: When i got this i thought i was buying a fancy flat iron like strightner. Lol. No. Its a comb shaped blowdryer....but im black with natural nappy hair. It doesnt work as good as a relaxer but it makes my hair a hell of alot easier to manage after i use it! Makes it nice and soft if you use any type of oil or lotion too! Black girl approved!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love 💘
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have very dry frizzy hair due to meds I'm on to treat my RA.. My skin as well to bad they don't have an Infiniti pro skin wet/dry skin styler lol. Makes my hair so smooth , silky and healthy looking again. Feels good to be able to make this frizzy mess look so great!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: The base is a bit bulky but it's better than the older model
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version and was upset when it finally broke. Thankfully I found this blow dryer because it blow dries my natural kinky/curly hair effortlessly. The base is a bit bulky but it's better than the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Jyabriel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I want my ORIGINAL INFINITI PRO hair dryer back!! Wish I could find the model that I was before this one! This sucks! I have extremely thick & curly hair and was disappointed that this did not work like the purple hair straightening dryer INFINITI PRO that was basically a hair dryer with a straightening attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4C hair
customer_reviews.text: Works very good on blowing out my hair I’m African-American and I have 4C type hair which curls up so tight it’s ridiculous. But I got a lot of relief with this comb dryer. FYI: Won’t make my hair dead straight though. excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, fine, wavy hair. This product flattened my hair too much, and at the same time, made it frizzy. Beware that the item cannot be returned. I wish I would have studied the one-star ratings more closely!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this hair dryer. I have thick, curly/wavy hair that I usually let air dry. This product allows me to dry it and brush it at the same time. I'm not good at using a brush and a hairdryer at the same time. After using this hairdryer, my hair is smooth and dry. No frizz.
customer_reviews.author: The Every Free Chance Reader

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN'T RETURN THIS!!! DON'T BUY IF YOU HAVE FULL HAIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had more power. This does not dry natural hair at all and I used small sections!!! I'm upset I couldn't return it!!! I love my other Conair Infiniti products this is highly disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: MoSuave

customer_reviews.title: Conair bring the Infinity pro 3-1 of two years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled this is not the infinity pro 3-1 that conair stopped making. This is not even a good upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: beejay

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after watching a lot of YouTube videos and reviews on this product. It’s works just ok on my 4b/4c hair. I think my expectations were too high. I don’t even use it anymore. I’ve gone back to using my tried and true Silverbird with a pick attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Bad for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I used this on the lowest to dry n blow out my semi wer natural hair. It had my hair crispy and what it did to my ends! Not to mention the amt of hair came out...after just my first use. Unbelievable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna J.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I had an Infinitipro dryer before and it lasted about 10 years. It was an awesome product for dryer my daughter's wet hair and straightening it out at the same time. Works great on African American hair texture. So, when I searched on Amazon for a replacement and was happy when I found another one.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Reid-Mills

customer_reviews.title: Compact hair dryer that gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Compact & efficient blow dryer. I dry my hair and DD’s hair with the cool setting because I don’t like heat on our hair. The cool setting is warm enough to dry our 4c hair and stretch it very nicely so that it’s more manageable. It is also compact enough to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: fizzle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ON AFRICAN AMERICAN HAIR
customer_reviews.text: WHERE HAVE THIS BEEN. WISH HAD KNOWN ABOUT SOONER! STRAIGHTEN AND DRY QUICKLY IN SAME SHORT TIME. GREAT ON AFRICAN AMERICAN HAIR! DO NOT BE WITHOUT THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAIRDRYER EVERRRR!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this hairdryer 3 times now. Each one has lasted 3-4 years. I use it weekly for three heads of very thick hair. I love it so much, i won't buy any other kind. I've tried using other hairdryers, but they don't make my hair as shiny and are a lot more damaging. The comb even helps to detangle. I'll NEVER use any other hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Asya&zadara

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever invented!!!!
customer_reviews.text: product being used by 10 yr. w/shoulder -length, VERY curly,tangled hair. She absolutely LOVES it - does it alone after her father went over instructions, precautions, etc. w/her. We have never even been able to get a wide-toothed COMB thru hair except immed.after it was shampooed/conditioned & very wet. Now uses this on damp hair & is done in less than 10 min. Wish we had learned abt. this ages ago - would have saved years of "ouch, your hurting me" sessions resulting in uncombed hair simply being pulled back w/covered stretchy band. She is sooo delighted - even has learned to "flip" the ends! PLUS - it actually stays the same all day-no styling product used, either!!
customer_reviews.author: grandmaDDS

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed because it works as though I should've paid $9
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for $34.99 a few months ago. I'm very disappointed because it works as though I should've paid $9.99. I wish i never bought it. Don't make the same mistake as I did. I wish I had bought one with actual bristles. It does not straighten what-so-ever either. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: sav88

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Does the job of a blow dryer ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does the job of a blow dryer and hot brush in one with far less damage. Cuts blow out time in half. Great for textured hair!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This hairdryer holds up.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it straightens naturally curly hair. This is the third one I am ordering. I ordered my first one at least 5 years ago and it held up, with daily use, all that time. I used to go through hair dryers every 6 months or so. Luckily I had a spare one I use for travel. Since I don’t want to be without one, I am ordering a spare. Please do not discontinue this model.
customer_reviews.author: avmanor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to use. Makes drying my Natural 4C hair a breeze. No arm fatigue which is a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Natral1

customer_reviews.title: Best for straightening hair
customer_reviews.text: Best blow dryer I’ve ever purchased to straighten hair. This is the second one I’ve purchased the other one I had for like 4 years. But I took it to Europe without a converter and that was the end. 😭. I literally thought my life was over. I died when that dryer died. Soooo glad they still make these. I might buy extra to put in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Sil

customer_reviews.title: This hair straightener is great! I have very thick hair that's fairly straight ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair straightener is great! I have very thick hair that's fairly straight on top and super wavy underneath. I've always had issues getting it completely straight because handling a brush and a hair dryer at the same time is just too much for me. This straighener is just the perfect solution for me. It makes the hair nice and straight but not as sleek as if I was using a straightening iron. Now I can style my hair perfectly without going to the hair salon. I'm super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product has been using it for over 16 years or more. Great for African-American long hair
customer_reviews.author: Drucilla Jones

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: PIECE OF JUNK!! This hair dryer burned out after 2 uses. My return period ended a couple of weeks ago, so now I have to pay for shipping to Conair to get a replacement. Hopefully the replacement will work more than twice. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie12

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair without snagging
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product because it does not pull or snag hair. Must experiment at first to find the right angle --and if you turn the wand at the end of the hair, it will smooth and curl it. OK to use other tools after initial drying for specific style.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: One worked great one didn’t at all
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much I bought a second one to have at work. But this one apparently has a short in it which makes using it a pain in the butt to try and use and it’s past my return window. Should have tried it sooner. Assumed they all worked. So it’s a 50/50 gamble it will work if you buy. But it works great if u get s good one.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient. Lightweight and not bulky. Works great and works with wet and dry hair. I personally like the dry hair method but I have tried the wet hair method and it works just as well. I am quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I rely on this styler/dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hairdryer/Styler....this hairdryer can't be found in stores, when I found it on Amozon I was thrilled, my old one of 8 yrs. just up & quit while we were vacationing. I rely on this dryer, because blowing with a standard blow dryer and round brush is just to slow and hard on arms after a while!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M. Arcella

customer_reviews.title: Very good and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I could use this on a wet hair, it’s just that I feel like it’s hard on my scalp whenever I use it as a brush
customer_reviews.author: April Sabellano

customer_reviews.title: Love using this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love using this hair dryer. No more frizz. I have African American relaxed but still thick hair. I have short haircut but my hair usually takes a long time to dry. This hair dryer saves me time on blow drying and doesn't fry my ends. My hair comes out silky, shiney, and no frizz. Natural sheen. Does not require any hair products in order to use. Light Weight. I just brought a family member one off of Amazon.com for Christmas after testing it on her hair. She has fine but frizzy hair. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Nicole

customer_reviews.title: DEAD ON ARRIVAL AND ITS NOT RETURNABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Product is horrible! I received it 4/2/2019 and it arrived broken. The black switch that's used to control your hair tension is broken. The box that the hair dryer came in looks like it was stepped on but the amazons box is ok. Trying to return it but it looks like IT'S NOT RETURNABLE. I'm so dissatisfied right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS ON ALL TEXTURES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural 4a\4b hair type with very thick hair it usually takes some one with GREAT SKILLS to tame my mane but this product was perfect especially those who are not trying to retain heat damage it doesn't get your hair flat iron straight if your of thicker hair like myself softer textures maybe , but it does make your hair 100 times more manageable if your natural 4a/b looking for a not so detrimental way to manage your hair. Perfect .
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great on my thick natural hair thats mid back length.
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine a few days ago. I absolutely love the results I've gotten. I have extremly thick natural hair & its about mid back length. When I tell I got through my whole hair in about 30-40 min with very little difficulty. (😢 tears) I wish i discovered this year's ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dedi

customer_reviews.title: The best dryer ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dryer ever. I have been using this for years. It's very hard to find, so when I see it on Amazon I buy a couple. I really am unsure as to why Conair stopped selling this. I have naturally curly/wavy hair. This gives my hair body and shine and straightens it as no other product that I have tried. I pretty much have tried everything that is out there and nothing comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much that I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer is so awesome and easy to use that I bought two! One from my house, and one for my boyfriends house. It only has a couple of heat settings, but it gets my hair beautifully silky straight without having to add more heat to my hair. I haven’t had to use the flat iron since I bought this blow dryer. Maybe a curling iron to add some wave if I want it. This has been the answer to my prayers to lessen heat damage to my hair. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denine

customer_reviews.title: Less time flat ironing
customer_reviews.text: Dries quick and makes flat ironing a breeze. I have extremely thick, unruly black girl hair. I can blow dry and straighten my whole head in less than 2 hours. That's a big deal to me!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: No longer a great product.  Bait and switch.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This is my fourth dryer over many years. What's wrong? It no longer has the ceramic teeth, as advertised. They have switched it out, and replaced with plastic teeth. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: MAGICAL! I ordered this awhile back and finally gave it a shot this morning. I have a LOT of somewhat kinky hair. It took me about 15 minutes to brush through my hair this morning and when I finished, I was AMAZED at the results. I had HIGHLY doubted it would work but was I wrong! When I was finished, I lightly ran the straightener through my hair [because I'm slightly obsessive about my hair] - overall it took 20 minutes to do what normally takes 30+ minutes and seems a lot healthier than a 400 degree straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Natural friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have very densely, packed hair that is kinky curly and this dried and straightened my hair in under an hour. It’s thinner than the Revlon paddle brush dryer, and doesn’t have a hot spot. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Dry well. I like it because it's soft heat. Some people don't like that. It does an excellent job straightening my daughter's natural hair. I also use it to fix flyaways and to quickly straighten my hair. It never overdries or cook the hair. I hate that I can no longer find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: #Blessing
customer_reviews.text: A blessing for anyone who has thick natural hair like me. I was able to use this and get my hair braided the next day without having to straightening it. I don't like putting too much heat to my hair and this was perfect, the fact that I didn't need to straighten after blow drying was a blessing. I highly recommend, if it can make my hair almost look like it was straightened anyone can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T RETURN SO MAKE SURE YOU WANT IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to try out and honestly, not very impressed. I was going to return it, but guess what, I can't!! Didn't see anything on the site when I was looking at it about not being able to return it. Also, it is NOT that color shown in the picture. Mine was a more faded look.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. My hair is fine and very curly. I had a difficult time keeping my hair on the tool while trying to blow dry my wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: judyjay

customer_reviews.title: Just Do It!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite go to for thick, course hair. I had one for over 13 years and it broke. Went online and Amazon had it. (That's why I love this site.) Reordered and it came right away. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: At first, I didn't think It was powerful enough ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn't think It was powerful enough. After 20 minutes, I was done blow drying and my hair is down to my waist, curly (Shakira curls), and frizzy. I'm use to using the older version of the Infiniti Pro, so this was a bit different, but it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Angie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This items overheats and the seller will not accept returns. Definitely AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Book Pig

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot styler first time 2 years ago..and it was a love from first sight. I have naturally curly uneven hair. And I just dry them using this hot brush- and they perfect in fast no time, no curling irons, no straighteners needed. I hate drying hair but with styler it is just a fun. I use it on wet and dry hair and they always look perfect. I order this item again and again. I cannot understand why only Conair has such wonder tool? What about other brands? I'm afraid one day Conair will stop production of this amazing tool. I hope it will never happen.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hair Dryer for African American Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick 4c hair and the Infiniti Pro was able to blow dry my hair very well. It didn't take a long time and it blow dried my hair pretty straight. It's easy to hold and it doesn't burn my hair. It's the best hair dryer I've ever used. I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I used this on my daughter’s hair, as well as clients of many hair textures and it has yet to disappoint. The hair is left shiny, and it dries fast. I will be ordering another one to keep at home.
customer_reviews.author: tianna

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Omg love it dry sooooooo much I been using this same one for like 10 years now when it break I buy again I’m glad to know I can find on amazon ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ladystylez

customer_reviews.title: I have frizzy 4C hair and this did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: I have frizzy 4C hair and this did not work well at all. just pulled on the hair. went back to my blow dryer pik attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Optimus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much..a life saver for my very tender headed 6 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Don't get what this product was for. It can't be used as flat iron (can't straighten hair at all), and hair dryer either (it's like 80% weaker drying power than regular dryer). It also has weird plastic smell while It's in used. The worst is it's not allowed for return even with prime!
customer_reviews.author: lkc216

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!!!! Going to buy one for my mother!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I'm impressed. I'm African American and I have very very curly hair, like natural tight spiral curls and this thing straightened my hair in 10 minutes. My hair was still fluffy and my roots were not straight but if I took my time and dried smaller portions of my hair I think I would have gotten better results. It usually takes about 2 hours to flat iron my hair. This thing is AMAZING. I wish I found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: wendy hunter

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite styler
customer_reviews.text: I have this, fine, wavey hair. I absolutely love this dryer. Got my first one about 15 years ago and am so thankful I can replace through Amazon. Allows me to style, smooth and dry my hair in less than 5 minutes! My hair is smooth and has lots of body. I haven't found another dryer that compares.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: I like this, but I like my chair blow dryer ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but I like my chair blow dryer with a slim comb attachment better. Though my hair did dry, I felt like it took longer and did get as dry. It may be because of my short thick hair, but until my hair grows out for me to test, this was good for now.
customer_reviews.author: chef4disney

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!  So Easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had this item on my amazon wish list for a couple years and finally decided to just buy it for myself. After just one use, I'm kicking myself for not buying it sooner. It is so easy to use and my hair looks like I just went to the salon. Seriously, I used the Infiniti for about 3-4 minutes on my damp hair and it looks SO GOOD I can't believe it. It was so easy, it was just like brushing my hair and the shine and body are only matched by a salon visit. I have thick, short hair cut in a shag bob. Try it...you won't be dissapointed. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a long pixie cut and this works great for me. My daughter has long hair and she also likes it.
customer_reviews.author: C Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had one before I bought from Avon. This one works just like my other one. Seemed like it might have been used. The side had discoloration to it. Kept it anyways
customer_reviews.author: Dana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Meh. My hair is too thick to get good results
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, I just have really wiry hair and it wasn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is fine, but kind of defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, curly hair, and it takes a LONG time to use this and get my hair to be decently straight, and even then, I still have to go over a lot of it with my flat iron. Its been quicker to just let my hair air dry a little, use this to quickly dry it the rest of the way, and then just use my flat iron, which is fine, but kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Swan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer! This is my 3rd one and it works great on coarse curly hair! After about 2 1/2 years it seems to die but I always got my money worth using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Big Deb

customer_reviews.title: Purchase of a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: I literally dried all my hair in Ten minutes!!! I have never even when my hair was very short done this! Amazed!!! You got a buyer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy R

customer_reviews.title: I feel its not as good as my first one
customer_reviews.text: I had this product from before thats why I reordered it once the first wore out. I found this one to be a little different and the button on top does not work. It stays at one setting. I feel its not as good as my first one.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: awful product
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. Does not produce enough heat to even dry or straighten my hair. Takes forever. And can not be returned. My hair is mostly straight, just a little frizz at times. But this barely blows warm air. I have to now buy something else just to dry my hair. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer ever. I purchased one like this about 8 years ago and never want to be without one. It makes my hair texture straight and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: II bought this product for my sister I use this product on my daughter when she was younger and it worked perfectly straighten her hair I didn't have no problems cuz she had tangled hair and she used to cry all the time when I got this product she loved when her hair was straighten
customer_reviews.author: Karen N Parris

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this . I have curly wavy hair and it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected... the brush is not a brush more like hard teeth like a comb. I was thinking there would be some bristles to smoother the hair and style. I requested a return the same day as delivered before I even tried it and it was not eligible for return!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Storelli

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for short hair
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not so good for short hair. I ended up giving it to my daughter who has long hair and she like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: heart

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothing hair and styling bangs
customer_reviews.text: I use this to touch up my hair after blow drying it with the conair infiniti pro dryer with brush attachment. It takes about 5 min just to smooth ends/smooth out any spots I missed with the brush dryer as well as to style my side-swept bangs. I also use it on dry hair to smooth out my bangs on days when I don't wash my hair. It works really well and easier and faster than using a straightening iron.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to anyone who has thick natural hair like ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone who has thick natural hair like me it gets all the way down to my roots and straightens it all the way to the tips It’s a lot lighter than your typical blow dryer and finish alot faster everytime this dryer goes out I just buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: BEST styler I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have 'Ever' rated a product!!...Why has no one thought of this sooner?..towel dried my daughters hair, I used John Frieda products, and first it dried her hair in record time, keep in mind she has naturally curly hair and soon I noticed a straightening effect which cut the whole process at least in half!..love this styler!..only thing is my teeth setting didn't work or maybe it was so gradual I couldn't tell, plan to do more research on that, but I will be getting another one just to have!
customer_reviews.author: buyingtimer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when I'm in a hurry. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: It is not a styler!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a comb that blows hot air. You cannot curl or straighten or add volume because it won’t stay in your hair. The bristles don’t catch hair, it is just a comb. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Robin McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all sorts of heat brushes and stuff to tame my mane....and this one seems to work pretty well! It is comfortable to hold, easy to use, and it seems to get the job done. My hair is medium long, and has the tendency to be frizzy, and this thing kept it together. The downside is that it does get really hot if you have a stubborn spot and hold it there too long, and it is not going to be good for really long or really curly hair. Overall I am happy with this so far....
customer_reviews.author: L. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not make it super straight, but enough to wear loose and MUCH easier to comb through. Bought mine 7 years ago...still going strong!! Will buy 2 more, one as a gift and one as insurance. (medium thickness 4b hair)
customer_reviews.author: Niella

customer_reviews.title: This one's a dud!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I've always had good luck with this appliance. I consistantly get good results, that's why I continue to replace it. This time I bought it in June and it died yesterday.(3-1/2 months) I'm less than happy with the preformance of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase because I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for years and when it finally died I bought another! Truly a go to hair styler. Make sure you use heat protection and you're all set. I have very long, thick hair and I use Argan Oil from Josie Moran. I do use a flat iron afterwards just to smooth out the rough edges, but this cuts the time in half!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mersing

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter. She uses it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She uses it to dry and straighten her hair after she shampoos and conditions. It takes way less time than if she uses a regular hair dryer and flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Y.  Allen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware- It's not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work as described and it's not returnable. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: C. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for little black girls with natural hair
customer_reviews.text: Washing my daughters hair is quite a chore and I'm trying not to break down and put any chemicals in it. I was so pleased with this product. It really dried and straightend her hair. Afterwards I didn't even need the flat iron, I jut used the edge stick on her edges and ponytailed it up and we were done. Great price, great product
customer_reviews.author: Nona's Momma

customer_reviews.title: So far good. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far good. Very easy to use. Gets my daughters mixed hair safely straight. Her hair is relaxed and she is able to dry and straighten after shampooing in less than half the time. She no longer flat irons for that straight look and we don't get any burnt hair smell that she used to get when she professionally got it blow dried and flat ironed. Plus it's a lot cheaper and safer to avoid all that extra heat.
customer_reviews.author: LovingEducation

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, but burns out and dies easily...
customer_reviews.text: I love this for straightening my thick curly hair, unfortunately I have now had 2 of them and both burnt out way to soon. As much as I want another, I am going to have to search up a different brand/ straightener as I don't enjoy continually replacing hair care items.
customer_reviews.author: Questa Knapper

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Wet/Dry Hot Air Brush Styler
product_meta.description: The Infiniti Pro by Conair Wet/Dry Hot Air Styler straightens, shines, and controls frizz with its Triple Action Styling System. It detangles, straightens, and shines with ease. The unique tension control system is suited for all hair types. It features Tourmaline Ceramic Technology, technology that outputs ions to help smooth the cuticle layer drying from the inside out, providing faster, more gentle, more efficient drying process. Infrared energy protects hair’s natural luster creating silky, shiny hair. This seals the hair cuticle, reducing frizziness, leaving the hair shiny and more manageable. It also includes a 2-speed slide switch, and a cool shot button to lock in styles.
feature_bullets: Straightens, shines, and controls frizz with a Triple Action Styling System
Safely dry + style damp hair to create smooth results
Infrared energy protects hair's natural luster creating silky, shiny hair
Includes a 2 speed slide switch, and a cool shot button to lock in styles
